StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTakeOneCardLoca.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Loca.onID uniqueiden..er
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT tol.ID, tol.TakeOneCardID, tol.Loca.onName, tol.LocStreet1, tol.CityCode, tol.CountyCode, tol.StateCode, tol.ZipCode, tol.ContactFirstName, tol.ContactLastName, tol.ContactMiddleIni.al, tol.ContactTitle, tol.Phone, tol.EmailAddress, tol.Stock, tolr.RestockDate, tolr.StockAdded, tol.IsAc.ve FROM rssoss.USMC.TakeOneLoca.on tol LEFT OUTER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.TakeOneLoca.onRestock tolr on tolr.TakeOneLoca.onID = tol.ID and tolr.ID = (select MAX(tolr2.ID) from RSSOSS.USMC.TakeOneLoca.onRestock tolr2 where tolr2.TakeOneLoca.onID = tol.ID) WHERE tol.ID = @Loca.onID
END
